element.name: zamgtabext
element.label: Extent
element.description: Temporal and geographic extents of the dataset.

element.name: zamgtabres
element.label: Resolution
element.description: Spatial and temporal resolutions of the data.

element.name: zamgtabstorage
element.label: Data storage
element.description: Information about the formats the data is distributed, and its file size.

element.name: zamgtabsrcinfo
element.label: Source information
element.description: Information about the data source and processing.

element.name: zamgtabauthor
element.label: Data author
element.description: Contact information about the expert who gathered or processed the dataset.
element.help: This information will not be visibile outside ZAMG.

element.name: zamgtabdistributor
element.label: Data distributor
element.description: Contact information about the ZAMG department which can distribute the data to external users.

element.name: zamgRegions
element.label: Region
element.help: Metadata record will containg the related ISO3166-2:AT code.

element.name: zamg-variable
element.label: Variable name
element.description: The main variable name for the dataset.
element.help: Set the main variable name as a keyword from a fixed thesaurus.

element.name: zamg-uom
element.label: Unity of Measure
element.description: The UoM for the main variable in the dataset.
element.help: Set the uom as a keyword from a fixed thesaurus.

element.name: zamg-sourcetype
element.label: Source type
element.description: The source type for the data in the dataset.
element.help: Set the source type as a keyword from a fixed thesaurus.

element.name: zamg-datatype
element.label: Data type
element.description: The data type for the data in the dataset.
element.help: Set the data type as a keyword from a fixed thesaurus.

element.name: zamg-restriction
element.label: Restriction
element.description: Tells if this metadata is for internal use only.
element.help: Set to public if this (meta)data could be exported outside ZAMG.
